price: 99. Nabii Yaq-qhuub kee kay buxaaxih mari masri baaxo fanah yewqe Nabii Yuusuf fanah gexak, tokkel usun Nabii Yuusuful culen waqdi usuk isi namma xaltani aliilit xabba heeh isi buxah ken orbise, isin masri marih baaxo Yallih fayxih kulli umaanck amaanah anuk cula keenik iyye.
arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَبَوَيۡهِ وَقَالَ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مِصۡرَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā dakhalū ʿalā yūsufa āwā ilayhi abawayhi waqāla ud'khulū miṣ'ra in shāa al-lahu āminīna
